Tasteâ€¦ Salted vegetables ~ Fresh meat ~ Also a kind of flower roll or sugar-free taro ~~ My fatherâ€™s cooking skills are also very good ~ Although it is not the same as the motherâ€™s skillsâ€¦ But my motherâ€™s pasta is a bit worseâ€¦ Pasta is a must for my father. æˆ‘åœ¨æ—è¾¹çœ‹è§çˆ¸çˆ¸å‹ºäº†å¤§åŠç“·ç›†é¢ç²‰ â€¦ç„¶ååŠ æ°´ â€¦åŠ é…µæ¯ç²‰ â€¦ ç„¶åå†ä½¿åŠ²å„¿ç»†ç»†çš„æ‰ â€¦ æ‰å¥½äº†æ”¾åœ¨ä¸€è¾¹ ~ æ´—æ‰‹ååˆæ‹¿ç §æ¿æ”¾åœ¨æ¡Œå­ä¸Š â€¦ å†å°†æ´—å¥½çš„è‚‰å’Œç‚’ç†Ÿçš„ç›èœæ”¾åœ¨å„ä¸ªå°ç¢—é‡Œï¼Œè¿˜æœ‰ä¸€å¤§æ—©å¦ˆå¦ˆå»èœå›­æ‹”å›æ¥å·²ç»æ´—å‡€çš„å°è‘±ä¸€ä¸€æ‹¿è¿‡æ¥ ~ çˆ¸çˆ¸å…ˆå°†è‚‰åˆ‡æˆä¸€å¨å¨çš„ â€¦ å†åˆ‡æˆå—çŠ¶ â€¦ å†åˆ‡æˆä¸â€¦ ç„¶åä¸€èµ·å‰æˆäº›æ²«å †å † â€¦åŠ å„ç§è°ƒå‘³æ–™æ‹ŒåŒ€ ~~ åœ¨ä¸€è¾¹çœ‹çš„æˆ‘æ„Ÿè§‰è‡ªå·±éƒ½å·å­¦åˆ°æ‰‹äº†â€¦å“ˆå“ˆ å¦ˆå¦ˆçœ‹æˆ‘ä¸€å‰¯é¦‹çŒ«çš„æ ·å­ â€¦ éƒ½å·ä¹å•¦~ï˜‚ ç°åœ¨æ—©ä¸Šçš„æ—©é¤æˆ‘å’Œç†Šå­©çº¸éƒ½èƒ½åƒåˆ°çˆ¸çˆ¸åšçš„åŒ…å­ç‰¹å¹¸ç¦å•Šï’“ ~~~ ä¸€ç¢—æ‚ç²®ç²¥å‡ ä¸ªåŒ…å­åƒçš„æˆ‘æ’‘åˆ°æ‰¶å¢™éƒ½ç¬‘å‘µå‘µ~ï¤— I saw my father spoon most of the flour in the porcelain basin â€¦ then add water â€¦ add yeast powder â€¦ then knead it carefully â€¦ knead it well and put it aside â€¦ wash his hands and then put the chopping board on the table â€¦ then put the washed meat and fried Salt dish in each small bowl of inside. In the early morning, my mother went to the vegetable garden to pull out the cleaned shallots and brought them back one by one ~ my father cut the meat into lumps first â€¦ then into lumps â€¦ then into shreds â€¦ then cut them into foam piles together â€¦ add all kinds of seasonings and mix them well ~ ~ looking at them, I felt that I had learned my hand secretly â€¦ ha ha My mother looked at me like I was greedy for cats â€¦ and I was having fun ~ï˜‚ Now for breakfast in the morning, my children and I can both eat steamed buns made by my father, which is very happy ~ ~ ~ a bowl of coarse cereal porridge and a few steamed buns, and I will support The Wall with mirth ~ï¤— Love what I love, Do what I like to do, Listen to the heart Feel it with love. Donglin temple in jiujiang lushan mountain area, is a very famous temple, even the big temple ï¯ has a certain reputation According to the recordâ€¦ Donglin temple was designated by the state council as the key temple of Buddhism in China in 1983. Located at the western foot of lushan mountain, it is the birthplace of pure land Buddhism. There are a lot of cultural deposits here, plus some products of time, so a long time, incense also more vigorous ~~ I grew upâ€¦ Even the most beautiful picturesque majestic in jiangxi ï˜… havenâ€™t been to lushan? This time with close friends, the honour in a donglin temple at the foot of lushan mountain. Fortunately, nanchang is not far from the donglin temple, friends drive about 3 hours on the road, get off the bus canâ€™t wait to visit the donglin temple scenery mood only increase not reduce We stood at the foot of the mountain, looking up, I do not know how many steps to climb the tower, stone steps on both sides is a row of tall straight bamboo forest, lush, shaded into the shade, there is a paradise like elegant and clean The entrance to donglin templeâ€¦ Look far away, the grand donglin temple perspective is even more spectacular ah! Surrounded by a famous buddhist jungle, I climbed to the top of the tower, around the tower once, looking at the distant scenery, see the people nearby, seems to have realizedâ€¦ When we come to the gate of donglin temple, we can deeply feel the solemn atmosphere of the buddhist holy spirit Someone told us at the door, into the donglin temple have a rule: the girl canâ€™t send out, the door to his left foot across the first canâ€™t step on the threshold, because temple has asked to dress, canâ€™t wear short skirt, a little sister first gave me a pink cover cloth, feel with wear a skirt today donâ€™t take, I volunteered to say can change a little sister? Little sister agreed, surrounded feeling also very not is extremely ugly ï™ˆ a little shyâ€¦ ï˜… Entering the hall, the front of the western paradise according to the solemn picture, give us a shock! This is the art of painting to express the appreciation and longing for the paradise ahâ€¦ If you want to know more about pure land culture, you can also linger in front of the exhibition board in the reception hallâ€¦ Then everyone followed the crowd to worship the Buddhaâ€¦ Written on the wall inside, the Buddha said: in the Buddhaâ€™s door, everything is required! But for a moment my mind was empty. I could not think of anything to ask forâ€¦ Is this the realm of seeking without seeking, without seeking without seeking? We went along quietly to enjoy each building in the temple, which was exceptionally unique and attractiveâ€¦ Every now and then the sandalwood smells! Imperceptibly integrated into the serious spirit of the atmosphere, along the way to enjoyâ€¦ Feeling all the wayâ€¦ Everything here is so quietâ€¦ Quiet, the pace of people walking, the gesture of looking at the scenery, the voice of whispering conversation, every hall, even those scenery, give people a quiet, solemn feeling, the buddhist gate is quiet, really a quiet land! Walking in the garden, everywhere can see pious monks, feel the baptism of the Buddha, everyone here will have a harvest, walk a look, you can learn a lot of things, give yourself a spiritual sublimation Out of curiosity, I quietly observed that there are many merit boxes in the temple, but no one forced you; The money thrown into the box of merit depends entirely on the wishes of pilgrims and visitors themselves. I couldnâ€™t help but extol from the heart: the details all show the holiness of the buddhist gate. In todayâ€™s materialistic, to do this, it is not easy! Donglin temple is worthy of thousands of years famous temple temple! When we left donglin temple, although it was already afternoon, we were still in high spirits. We walked to the gate of donglin temple and took a group photo in the background. Donglin temple to do not want to go to the temple, go also want to go to the temple, it is unforgettable ah! Love what I love, Do what I like to do, Listen to the heart Feel it with love. I will never ask for more, whatever that comes, let it be. From the moment you interact with me, our friendly relationship begun.
